name: src_searchly_api_v1_controllers_song_search
description:
Endpoint for an end-user client to search songs from the database given a String query.

If you want to run the /song/search operation, you can do so via an HTTP GET command to the following URL:

```
https://searchly.asuarez.dev/api/v1/song/search
```

$ul: **error**: Whether or not the request was successfully processed or not.
**message**: Error message if the request was unsuccessful.
**response**: Contains the response data if the request was successful.
